TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
What version was it we broke the forum again?

I believe it was 0.23, after kerbalkon.

link to thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62068-0-23-Waiting-Room%21

Fun times.

Ah, memories

Ah, memories

I say lets do it again!
I take it there's no confirmed release date for .24 yet. I'm starting to get anxious here!
I say it will be out on Tuesday

That gif of hammering F5, that made me chuckle as I'm similar for the past few days

I have lots of holiday left, I might even take a day off when it finally comes out!

0.24.2424.10000000001.11.KERBILLION Jiggathread!!!! *Explosions! Electric Guitar Noises! Contracts flying everywhere*

Edited July 3, 2014 by GregroxMun

I believe it was 0.23, after kerbalkon.

link to thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62068-0-23-Waiting-Room%21

Fun times.

It was a really great day. I can`t wait for the next one.

so...got a 3 day weekend and no plans...it'd be a shame if something happened to occupy all this free time ill have....

edit: oh and btw this is now the .24 waiting thread.

*Stares at r4pt0r - giggles slightly crazy*
Forum seems to be glitching out both for me and Fleet Master. Good work guys!
It'll be a while yet, maybe 1-2 weeks before .24. Maybe even more, depends on how long it needs in experimentals. Don't get your hopes up now, you'll just be disappointed...
I reckon it will be 2 or more weeks but judging by how often the forum is crashing ppl think it is coming soon.
This ought be the .24 waiting room thread. The OP makes it seem more exciting than it is.
How about that Robotengineer?
New title makes it too exciting. Please dull down title.
I already miss the explosions and electric guitar noises. Waiting is horrible.

How about that Robotengineer?

I think I know that song but I can't tell because it's muzack. Is that Welcome to the Jungle? Oddly soothing when done as light jazz.

(based on a real story)

*stares at clock in the corner, hoping, waiting, slowly turning insane*

Anybody know where I can find a lot of rocket fuel? I'm asking... for a friend.

There is pain.

There's waiting. Then there's elevator waiting. Then there's waiting to get on the elevator to wait. Then there's waiting to wait for the elevator so you can begin the elevator waiting. This is my stage of pain and anxiety.

This new update smuggles Whackjovian kryptonite. It is a poison that seeks to reduce the size of my builds. But it is so cunningly prepared and presented that I want to eat it anyway. Full well knowing it will do me harm. I could swear they made homemade frosting for it even.
*Walks in, looks around nervously, takes a seat. Begins whistling tunelessly as the muzak plays ...*
I am currently experiencing the "pre-update don't want to play without the new features so I just wont play at all" syndrome

(Seriously, though, I don't mind the wait at all. This wait is nothing to any of us who are Dwarf Fortress fans. The last time DF got an update, KSP 0.15.2 was the newest version. And it's still in active development, mind you.)

Edited July 4, 2014 by SkyRender
I'm like that too. Then I'll be completely obsessed for weeks after the release. Then gradually tapper off till the announcement of the next update.

(Seriously, though, I don't mind the wait at all. This wait is nothing to any of us who are Dwarf Fortress fans. The last time DF got an update, KSP 0.15.2 was the newest version. And it's still in active development, mind you.)

Dwarf Fortress? Love that game. It's as close as you can get to the "gameplay over graphics" ideal.

Dwarf Fortress? Love that game. It's as close as you can get to the "gameplay over graphics" ideal.

Awesome, a fellow DFer! Ever post anything to the DF forums, by chance? I stopped visiting there a while back, around the time KSP really took off (0.17), but now I'm curious if we've encountered one another there before. I usually stuck around the DF Dwarf Mode Discussion forum, and focused on megaprojects and ways to break the already broken economy even further.

Edited July 4, 2014 by SkyRender
*takes number, is 502* I have a feeling I'm gonna be here a while...
